titles.title: Taxpayer Abuse Prevention Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal provisions relating to qualified tax collection contracts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/12/2005--Introduced. Taxpayer Abuse Prevention Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions enacted by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 authorizing the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into contracts with private collection agencies for the collection of taxes.
